Text: Such a shame! An induction ceremony that usually takes 2,5 to 3 hours and now only 39 minutes and 12 seconds. Was this all the tv aired or did the uploader just took out most of the broadcast?

it was on sky sports for an hour here in uk at 5am for an hour. so miss out the ads itll be about 40 mins,think its just the last 2 inductees.does anyone know if the whole lot was aired or are they waiting to put it on the mania dvd
This was great to wacth, especially The Million Doller Man at the end but where was Stu Hart and the rest....too short man!
@pat.bateman , yeh i know they showed short clips but that was it. The whole thing was too short. Maybe it's USA Network.
@bateman , guess they goto do what they goto do i suppose. Still enjoyed it all the same but it will be soon time for Mania.

one thing tho,do not read comments when mania comes up. i think we all know what happenned when the rumble was uploaded, some dicks spoilt it for everyone.i avoid looking at the comments on payperviews now.
@ quakerray & bateman. Well all i can say on mania is that i hope this year is better than last year and that Taker keeps the streak. Will be nice to see vince get his ass wooped by bret. Finaly!
Is there a torrent with the entire complete ceremony uploaded yet?
